this tutorial are worked this way and it is my personal preference when it comes to making amigurumi if you choose to crochet with the traditional right side facing outwards there will be no significant difference regarding how the finished piece will turn out so feel free to crochet this amigurumi however you like finished items made from this pattern may be sold provided credit is given
